title: Getting started
text: PCS codes composed seven alphanumeric characters. character contains 34 possible values. seven characters make complete code specific meanings vary 17 sections manual. value represents specific option general character definition. 10 digits (0-9) 24 letters (-H, J-N, P-Z) may used character. letters O used avoid confusion digits 0 1.

title: Getting started
text: character axis classification specifies information procedure performed. Within defined code range, character specifies type information axis classification. example, fifth axis classification specifies Approach sections 0 4 7 9 system.
code: tibble(   Position = c("Label", "Code", "Meaning"),   `1` = c("Section", "0", "Medical and Surgical"),   `2` = c("Body System", "0", "Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves"),   `3` = c("Operation", "1", "Bypass"),   `4` = c("Body Part", "6", "Cerebral Ventricle"),   `5` = c("Approach", "0", "Open"),   `6` = c("Device", "7", "Autologous Tissue Substitute"),   `7` = c("Qualifier", "0", "Nasopharynx")) |>    gt() |>    tab_spanner(label = "Table", columns = c(`1`, `2`, `3`)) |>   tab_spanner(label = "Row", columns = c(`1`, `2`, `3`, `4`)) |>   tab_spanner(label = "Code", columns = c(`1`, `2`, `3`, `4`, `5`, `6`, `7`)) |>   cols_align(align = 'center') |>    opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |>    #opt_table_outline() |>    opt_table_lines(extent = "all") |>    tab_options(     column_labels.vlines.style = "solid",     column_labels.vlines.width = px(3),     #column_labels.font.weight = "bold",     heading.align = "left"   ) |>    tab_header(title = md("**ICD-10-PCS** Code Structure"))

title: Getting started
code: #> Error in nanoplot_options(data_bar_fill_color = "#0B0B45", data_bar_stroke_color = "#0B0B45", : unused argument (interactive_data_values = FALSE)

title: Getting started
code: tables() |> summarise(codes = sum(n_codes), prop = codes / 78220, .by = c(section, system)) |> left_join(sections()[c('code', 'label')], by = join_by(section == code)) |> left_join(systems()[c('code', 'label')], by = join_by(system == code)) |> select(section = label.x, code = system, system = label.y, codes, prop) |> gt(groupname_col = "section", rowname_col = "system") |> fmt_percent(columns = prop, decimals = 2) |> fmt_number(columns = codes, decimals = 0) |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> cols_align(align = "center", columns = code) |> cols_label(code = "") |> tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5), cell_text(weight = "bold")), locations = cells_body(columns = code)) |> opt_all_caps(locations = c("row_group")) |> opt_align_table_header(align = "left") |> tab_header(title = html("ICD-10-PCS 2024")) |> tab_options( column_labels.hidden = TRUE, heading.title.font.size = px(22), table.font.size = px(14), column_labels.border.bottom.width = px(0), column_labels.border.top.width = px(0), row_group.font.size = px(16))

title: Getting started
code: tables() |>    arrange(desc(n_codes)) #> # A tibble: 895 Ã— 6 #>    section system table description                             codes    n_codes #>    <chr>   <chr>  <chr> <chr>                                   <list>     <dbl> #>  1 0       04     041   Medical and Surgical, Lower Arteries, â€¦ <tibble>    1540 #>  2 0       04     047   Medical and Surgical, Lower Arteries, â€¦ <tibble>    1116 #>  3 3       3E     3E0   Administration, Physiological Systems â€¦ <tibble>    1056 #>  4 0       0D     0D1   Medical and Surgical, Gastrointestinalâ€¦ <tibble>    1045 #>  5 0       03     037   Medical and Surgical, Upper Arteries, â€¦ <tibble>     888 #>  6 0       0R     0RW   Medical and Surgical, Upper Joints, Reâ€¦ <tibble>     864 #>  7 0       02     021   Medical and Surgical, Heart and Great â€¦ <tibble>     848 #>  8 0       0R     0RP   Medical and Surgical, Upper Joints, Reâ€¦ <tibble>     743 #>  9 0       0S     0SW   Medical and Surgical, Lower Joints, Reâ€¦ <tibble>     710 #> 10 0       03     031   Medical and Surgical, Upper Arteries, â€¦ <tibble>     666 #> # â„¹ 885 more rows rows("041L")$axes #> [[1]] #> # A tibble: 16 Ã— 4 #>    axis  title     code  label                           #>    <chr> <chr>     <chr> <chr>                           #>  1 5     Approach  0     Open                            #>  2 5     Approach  4     Percutaneous Endoscopic         #>  3 6     Device    9     Autologous Venous Tissue        #>  4 6     Device    A     Autologous Arterial Tissue      #>  5 6     Device    J     Synthetic Substitute            #>  6 6     Device    K     Nonautologous Tissue Substitute #>  7 6     Device    Z     No Device                       #>  8 7     Qualifier H     Femoral Artery, Right           #>  9 7     Qualifier J     Femoral Artery, Left            #> 10 7     Qualifier K     Femoral Arteries, Bilateral     #> 11 7     Qualifier L     Popliteal Artery                #> 12 7     Qualifier M     Peroneal Artery                 #> 13 7     Qualifier N     Posterior Tibial Artery         #> 14 7     Qualifier P     Foot Artery                     #> 15 7     Qualifier Q     Lower Extremity Artery          #> 16 7     Qualifier S     Lower Extremity Vein            #>  #> [[2]] #> # A tibble: 4 Ã— 4 #>   axis  title     code  label                  #>   <chr> <chr>     <chr> <chr>                  #> 1 5     Approach  3     Percutaneous           #> 2 6     Device    J     Synthetic Substitute   #> 3 7     Qualifier Q     Lower Extremity Artery #> 4 7     Qualifier S     Lower Extremity Vein

title: Getting started
code: definitions() |>    summarise(n = n(),              .by = c(code, section, axis, axis_name)) |>    arrange(axis) #> # A tibble: 29 Ã— 5 #>    code  section                                           axis  axis_name     n #>    <chr> <chr>                                             <chr> <chr>     <int> #>  1 0     Medical and Surgical                              3     Operation    31 #>  2 1     Obstetrics                                        3     Operation    12 #>  3 2     Placement                                         3     Operation     7 #>  4 3     Administration                                    3     Operation     3 #>  5 4     Measurement and Monitoring                        3     Operation     2 #>  6 5     Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Perforâ€¦ 3     Operation     3 #>  7 6     Extracorporeal or Systemic Therapies              3     Operation    11 #>  8 7     Osteopathic                                       3     Operation     1 #>  9 8     Other Procedures                                  3     Operation     1 #> 10 9     Chiropractic                                      3     Operation     1 #> # â„¹ 19 more rows definitions(section = "F") |>    filter(axis == "5") |>    select(label) |>    mutate(axis_code = row_number(), .before = 1) #> # A tibble: 132 Ã— 2 #>    axis_code label                                           #>        <int> <chr>                                           #>  1         1 Acoustic Reflex Decay                           #>  2         2 Acoustic Reflex Patterns                        #>  3         3 Acoustic Reflex Threshold                       #>  4         4 Aerobic Capacity and Endurance                  #>  5         5 Alternate Binaural or Monaural Loudness Balance #>  6         6 Anthropometric Characteristics                  #>  7         7 Aphasia (Assessment)                            #>  8         8 Aphasia (Treatment)                             #>  9         9 Articulation/Phonology (Assessment)             #> 10        10 Articulation/Phonology (Treatment)              #> # â„¹ 122 more rows

title: Getting started
code:
pcs("0016070") |> gt(rowname_col = "axis") |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> cols_align(align = "center", columns = c(axis, code)) |> tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5), cell_text(weight = "bold")), locations = cells_body(columns = code)) |> opt_all_caps() |> tab_header(title = html("ICD-10-PCS 2024
"), subtitle = html("SECTION: 0 Medical and Surgical
SYSTEM: 0 Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves
OPERATION: 1 Bypass

")) |> tab_options( heading.title.font.size = px(24), heading.subtitle.font.size = px(18), heading.align = "left", table.font.color = "#0B0B45" ) definitions() |> dplyr::filter(code == '0', axis == '3', axis_code == '1') |> dplyr::select(definition, explanation, includes) |> unlist() #> definition #> "Altering the route of passage of the contents of a tubular body part" #> explanation #> "Rerouting contents of a body part to a downstream area of the normal route, to a similar route and body part, or to an abnormal route and dissimilar body part. Includes one or more anastomoses, with or without the use of a device" #> includes #> "Coronary artery bypass, colostomy formation" definitions() |> dplyr::filter(code == '0', axis == '5', label == 'Open') |> dplyr::pull(definition) #> [1] "Cutting through the skin or mucous membrane and any other body layers necessary to expose the site of the procedure" definitions() |> dplyr::filter(code == '0', axis == '6', label == 'Autologous Tissue Substitute') |> dplyr::pull(includes) #> [1] "Autograft" #> [2] "Cultured epidermal cell autograft" #> [3] "Epicel(R) cultured epidermal autograft"

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
text: goal procedural provide set tools working 2024 ICD-10-PCS procedure classification system.

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("andrewallenbruce/procedural")

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
text: ICD-10-PCS, International Classification Diseases, 10th Revision, Procedure Coding System, procedure classification system used code procedures performed hospital inpatient health care settings.
code: library(procedural)

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: index(search = "Achillorrhaphy") #> # A tibble: 1 Ã— 5 #>   letter term           verb  pcs_value       table #>   <chr>  <chr>          <chr> <chr>           <chr> #> 1 A      Achillorrhaphy See   Repair, Tendons 0LQ

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: tables("0L") #> # A tibble: 19 Ã— 6 #>    section system table description                             codes    n_codes #>    <chr>   <chr>  <chr> <chr>                                   <list>     <dbl> #>  1 0       0L     0L2   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Change   <tibble>       4 #>  2 0       0L     0L5   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Destrucâ€¦ <tibble>      84 #>  3 0       0L     0L8   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Division <tibble>      84 #>  4 0       0L     0L9   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Drainage <tibble>     252 #>  5 0       0L     0LB   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Excision <tibble>     168 #>  6 0       0L     0LC   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Extirpaâ€¦ <tibble>      84 #>  7 0       0L     0LD   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Extractâ€¦ <tibble>      28 #>  8 0       0L     0LH   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Insertiâ€¦ <tibble>       6 #>  9 0       0L     0LJ   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Inspectâ€¦ <tibble>       8 #> 10 0       0L     0LM   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Reattacâ€¦ <tibble>      56 #> 11 0       0L     0LN   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Release  <tibble>     112 #> 12 0       0L     0LP   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Removal  <tibble>      32 #> 13 0       0L     0LQ   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Repair   <tibble>      84 #> 14 0       0L     0LR   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Replaceâ€¦ <tibble>     168 #> 15 0       0L     0LS   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Repositâ€¦ <tibble>      56 #> 16 0       0L     0LT   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Resectiâ€¦ <tibble>      56 #> 17 0       0L     0LU   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Supplemâ€¦ <tibble>     168 #> 18 0       0L     0LW   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Revision <tibble>      38 #> 19 0       0L     0LX   Medical and Surgical, Tendons, Transfer <tibble>      56 tables("0LQ") #> # title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
